title: My pixel 3 suddenly stopped charding last night.
content:
My pixel 3 xl suddenly stopped charging last night for no reason..
I tried different chargers and different cables as well. 
It detects the cable but its not charging.
I also tried to charge it with my laptop but still no luck.. It only charges while in safe mode otherwise it only detects the cable and won't charge.
Please help
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
